# instalar geoIp


### intalador
```shell
# buscar is tenemos el repo
# sudo apt info geoip-bin


# tambien geo Ip
sudp apt install geoip-bin
```


### uso
```shell
# ----------------------------------------------
# --------------- por IP
geoiplookup 179.6.168.248
# output:

#    GeoIP Country Edition: PE, Peru


# ----------------------------------------------
# --------------- por domain
geoiplookup pcbyte.com.pe
# output:

#    GeoIP Country Edition: US, United States

# ----------------------------------------------
# --------------- por ipv6


```
